title: Validate token savings with real epic runs
description:
Measure actual token savings by comparing runs with and without context.

## Experiment Design
1. Select an epic with 5+ tasks
2. Run once WITHOUT context (baseline)
3. Run same epic WITH context enabled
4. Compare total tokens used

## Metrics to Capture
- [ ] Total tokens per task (with context)
- [ ] Total tokens per task (without context)
- [ ] Context generation token cost
- [ ] Net token savings percentage
- [ ] Task completion time comparison

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document baseline token usage
- [ ] Document with-context token usage
- [ ] Calculate ROI (generation cost vs savings)
- [ ] Savings > 30% for 5+ task epics
- [ ] Report created with findings

## Human Workflow
1. Create test epic with 5 representative tasks
2. Run with context disabled, record metrics
3. Reset/recreate epic
4. Run with context enabled, record metrics
5. Compare and document findings
